document.full_text: a $9 billion, 100-plane order from the leasing arm of u.s. insurance group aig has lifted airbus above boeing in new jetliner sales this year, putting pressure on its rival to clarify its next plane design.
document.title: aig pushes airbus past boeing in jet sales
lines_and_colors: a $9 billion, 100-plane order from the leasing arm of u.s. insurance group aig has lifted airbus above boeing in new jetliner sales this year, putting pressure on its rival to clarify its next plane design.
